column3: Latest;Mondulkiri Province: A rare wild------ banteng------ was captured on camera
column4: pleasing environmentalists and conservationists.------It appeared to have a leg injury
column6: but which seems to be healing.------Banteng were once found all over Southeast Asia
column7: but are now an endangered species. They are hunted for meat and horns
column8: but warnings have been given about diseased animals that may harm humans if eaten.
